messages.subject: While were in a Gandai frame of mind
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings all, a friend ( yes it was Milt ) purchased this and we were discussing the mei. Sorry, this is the best pic. It was sold as aKunisuke but I think it
messages.messageBody:
Greetings all, a friend ( yes it was Milt ) purchased this and we were
discussing the mei. Sorry, this is the best pic. It was sold as
aKunisuke but I think it reads Kanetsugu. Also the first two Kanji have
us stuck. WIth out looking at my book's, ( I love a challenge ) I was
thinking Yoshida Kanetsugu. Was I even close ???

Rich


http://www.whiz.com.au/richard/milt-mei.jpg


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
